feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.4
entry.content: • Fixed unlinking a plex account if the user selected the unlink option (issue: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/573)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.5
entry.content:
• Repaired multi-instance (removing swappar created a bug)
  • Updated the remove button for the multi-instances

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.6
entry.content:
• [History] For Sonarr - History now links to the proper address and will open via to Sonarr. Will be added for the rest (a challenge)
  • [Huntarr] Stop live hunts going blurry for some users hovering over (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/510)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.7
entry.content:
• [Whisparr v3] Fixed menu to link to Whisparr v3
  • [Huntarr] Conducted code review to remove dead/duplicate api points (caused no issues)
  • [Radarr] Resolved ticket (Radarr missing search release dates not working because dates not always available in radarr https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/570) - thanks @lemerv

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.6.6...7.6.7

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.8
entry.content: • [Readarr] Update Huntarr to track books instead of the author which caused problems for users [https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/505] as reported by
